c301.AdventureBook

Class TakePhotoActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • c301.AdventureBook.TakePhotoActivity

  • public class TakePhotoActivity
extends Activity
    Take Photo Activity allow user to take a photo from camera, or select a photo from phone's gallery. It will resize proccess and resize picture to be suitable for the app and then return its byte representation on return.
    Author:
    Zhao Zhang
